review: If you have a Netflix membership definitely download the app because there are a lot of TV shows you pay for even on Prime that are included with your streaming Netflix membership. We watched the Hunger Games (the three movies currrently out) and the first we had to buy (couldn't rent it), the second was available via Prime for free, and the third we had to rent. That was also disappointing. The device and how it works is still excellent, though, and that's why I gave it a full 5 stars.
